text: DXGB-TV (channel 11) is a television station in Zamboanga City, Philippines, affiliated with TV5. It is the flagship television property of locally based Golden Broadcast Professionals, Inc., which owned the station since its inception. DXGB-TV is a sister station to One Sports affiliate DXDE-TV (channel 29), and radio station DXEL (95.5 MHz). The three stations share studios and transmitter facilities at the GBPI Bldg., Campaner Street, Zamboanga City. ==Digital television== DXGB-TV currently operates on UHF Channel 51 (695.143 MHz). It is multiplexed into the following subchannels: Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Notes 11.1 720p 16:9 GBPI TV11 Golden Broadcasting Professionals Inc. (Main DXGB-TV programming) Commercial broadcast 11.2 TV5 TV5 11.3 One Sports One Sports 11.4 OnePH One PH 11.31 240p 4:3 GBPI TV11 1Seg Golden Broadcasting Professionals Inc. 1Seg test broadcast == Areas of coverage == === Primary areas === * Zamboanga City * Basilan ==== Secondary areas ==== * Portion of Zamboanga Sibugay * Portion of Zamboanga del Norte ==Related pages== * TV5 * List of television and radio stations owned by TV5 Network * Magic 95.5 Zamboanga * DXAX-DTV - TV5 digital affiated station in Zamboanga * DWET-TV ==References== Category:Television channels in Asia Category:Filipino television stations
title: DXGB-TV
